title: Countries with the largest gross domestic product ( GDP ) 2019
summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Country, and GDP in billion U.S. dollars in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum GDP in billion U.S. dollars 21439.45 is found at Country United States and the minimum is found at Switzerland where Country is 715.36.
The highest Country United States has 20724.09 more GDP in billion U.S. dollars than the lowest Country Switzerland.

max_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Country, and GDP in billion U.S. dollars in each Country on the y axis.
Country United States has the highest GDP in billion U.S. dollars and Switzerland has the lowest GDP in billion U.S. dollars.
Country China has the second highest value for GDP in billion U.S. dollars.
There is a difference of 20724.09 between the maximum Country United States and minimum Country Switzerland.
GDP in billion U.S. dollars at Country United States is 21439.45 , second place is China at 14140.16, and thirdly is Japan at 5154.48.
Considered together, the average GDP in billion U.S. dollars in all 20 Countrys is roughly 3505.92.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 70118.39.
